BookTitle: The Ultimate Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy: Five Novels in One Outrageous Volume
Content: “Because if they didn’t vote for a lizard,” said Ford, “the wrong lizard might get in. Got any gin?”

BookTitle: The Ultimate Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy: Five Novels in One Outrageous Volume
Content: “Life,” he said, “is like a grapefruit.” “Er, how so?” “Well, it’s sort of orangy-yellow and dimpled on the outside, wet and squidgy in the middle. It’s got pips inside, too. Oh, and some people have half a one for breakfast.”
